thread.section_title: Edge Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Small, but great
thread.title_full: Small, but great - Review of Edge Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: gelo7
title: Small, but great
text: Our room was about the size of a cruise ship cabin, but just like cruise ship cabins, the space was used efficiently. The room was clean and comfortable. The water from the facet, was cold enough to drink without the need for ice. The shower was hot, the water pressure was excellent. The staff was warm and friendly, and hard working. The free continental breakfast met our needs. The business area came in handy for logging in some work hours. My only caveat, were the thin walls. The guy on the phone in the room next to us, sounded like he was in the room with us.
